channel.title: [PI] Hacker
channel.description:
Hi there moparscapers!!
Today my players found someone hacking and deleting objects and spawning cobwebs..etc (they are still there but not visable) i have been wondering how that is possible? i made it so that people need my client to play my server but maybe they still can use a cheat client or something?? Please can someone help me out ?
Here is a screeny:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hJ6ZE9V.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Hacker
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

give me an open source version of your client (with java files cause I’m too lazy to decompile) and ill show you a lot more that can be done.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Hacker
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“zeldanoob, post:3, topic:530019”]Valid my packets?

Explaination a bit ?
i kinda know what you mean but do you have an explaintation[/quote]there is a reason why there isn’t a guide ( to my knowledge ) this isn’t released is because it separates the good servers from the bad ( no offence )

Here is a “cheaphax” it is not 100% it just delays does not fix

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/417970-important-protecting-your-server-wpe-packet-abusers.html

Read full topic
